alternatives.transcript: United States is undergoing a demographic transition it is becoming a more Multicultural Society attended with this change is the fact that the Urban Market Place now offers the greatest potential for future sales growth of products and services astute marketers understand that the amount of this growth will be determined by their ability to capture the awareness and loyalty of the urban consumer in order to more effectively

embrace the Urban Market Place in 1996 Benson and hedges will utilize a Grassroots strategy that leverages music and fun introducing the fun and exciting 1996 Club Benson & Hedges event marketing program the promotions new logo is colorful and bright and is guaranteed to attract the Brand's demographics the promotion will capitalize on to things that are of great interest to Urban consumers music and

one of the main elements of the promotion will be bar Knight's Club Benson & Hedges bar nights will include entertainment by top local artists in those clubs that feature live music and top local DJ's in those clubs that feature DJ's by employing local talent Benson and hedges will clearly demonstrate to the Urban Market Place it's Grassroots commitment to that market Club Benson & Hedges bar nights will be held Thursday through Saturday in selected nightclubs in

incident edges top markets each Club will be decorated with the club Benson & Hedges theme a club Benson & Hedges neon sign will be prominently displayed on the exterior of each club and the interior will be decorated with light box and banner signage a theme will be incorporated into the bar nights promotion to Unique themes and contests that are offered for consideration are and Electric Slide dance contest and a main squeeze

I'll dance contest the Electric Slide was selected since it is a relatively easy to do group dance that can involve many participants at the same time it is also a cross cultural dance that is enjoyed by many in urban centers the second theme the main squeeze freestyle dance contest is a natural for a bar promotion in urban centers since the term main squeeze is considered hip and is frequently used by urbanites to identify that special

someone in their life it is within a nightclub setting that many are known to pamper or pursue a main squeeze to ensure that bar nights are fun for attendees the contest will be formatted in a manner that avoids interrupting the music

the bar night promotions for each market will culminate with a club Benson & Hedges concert featuring a national recording artist the concert venue will also be decorated with the club Benson & Hedges theme from the Marquee to the tickets to the lobby to the meet and greet to the all-important center stage the strategically placed signage will reinforce the Benson & Hedges name the entire promotion will culminate

Nate in a 1996 Grand Finale concert with an on-stage Championship dance contest held during intermission support elements of plug Benson & Hedges include a contest sweepstakes that will be developed which ties the promotion to local retailers the contest will provide participants with a chance to win exciting prizes including exotic vacations tickets to Super Bowl 31 in 1997 and much more

nationally to dance finalists from the bar night promotions in each market will be invited to represent their City by competing in the grand finale most of Club Benson & Hedges database objectives will be met through the contest sweepstakes entry form playing off of Benson & Hedges highly successful advertising campaign for length you go to for pleasure we are proposing the Benson & Hedges pleasure Zone the ultimate Smoker Friendly Lounge for those who choose to smoke

poke it will totally redefine the meaning of a smoking section comfortable seating appetizers and drinks entertainment signage pack sales unique incentive items and much more will be featured in this area unlike the 1995 promotion the pleasure Zone clearly demonstrates the empathy Benson & Hedges feels for smokers the Benson & Hedges pleasure Zone will have two main objectives one to provide been

and hedges smokers with the ultimate Lounge in which to smoke and to to serve as a central location in which names can be generated for the database another suggested element for the promotion is a resource guide entitled City dancing the guide would tie the music and dance aspects of the promotion together it would be distributed as an incentive item that will provide something of real value to the urban consumer it will supply pertinent information regarding

guarding dancing and music in each respective urban center this type of incentive item would be taken home and treasured and would remind attendees of Benson & Hedges involvement in the event weeks and months later each element of this unique promotion will support each other by working in tandem to guarantee that in 1996 Club Benson & Hedges will rule the day
